name: LEAP Token
description: LEAP is helping to solve one of the most underrated issues in the sports industry today - The lack of opportunities for young talents. To do this, LEAP has built the next-generation sports discovery and endorsement platform, P2E game built by sports enthusiasts, for sports enthusiasts! $LEAP Token is the utility token created by LEAP global talent discovery platform to provide social and financial support for youth athletes and talented sports enthusiasts worldwide, focusing on developing countries. $LEAP Token is built with Solidity Programming language on ERC20, BEP20, and Polygon. It is the primary unit that the LEAP ecosystem participants, Leapers, and Community will use to interact with each other, participate in NFT listings and get rewards for stacking or activity within the LEAP Universe.
